Bihan is a Postdoctoral Researcher in Huber group. Her research lies at the intersection of deep learning and biology, with a particular focus on tackling challenges in high-content CRISPR screening through innovative computational approaches.

During her PhD in computational biology at Shanghai Institute of Health and Nutrition, she focused on deep learning and multi-omics data integration, particularly in applying these methods to improve cancer treatment and understand complex biological systems.
